The Library of Whispering Scrolls welcomes you. Candles flicker, dusty tomes float around, and a hooded wizard mutters: 
"Words are not just words here. They are weapons. Shout them, twist them, slice them ‚Äî and reality bends to your will." 
 
This week you learn String Magic: the art of controlling text in Python. 
 
Every word is a spell. 
Every letter is a rune. 
Every method is a magic incantation. 
 
Only those who master words can open locked doors, confuse goblins, or rename slimes into‚Ä¶ toast. 

Tags Introduced 
 
StringBasics ‚Üí what strings are and how to store them. 
StringIndexSlice ‚Üí extracting runes and scroll fragments. 
StringMethods ‚Üí powerful word spells like .upper(), .lower(), .replace(), .find(). 
StringFormatting ‚Üí status scrolls (mixing variables into text).

A string is text inside quotes. It could be one word, a whole sentence, or even ‚ÄúAHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!‚Äù (battle cry). 
 
In Python, strings are like magic scrolls. Whatever you write can be read, shouted, or transformed.

Strings are made of characters ‚Äî each character has a position (index). 
 
Indexing lets you grab a single rune (like the 1st letter). 
Slicing lets you tear out a piece of the scroll.

In RPG terms: 
‚Ä¢ spell[0] is like pointing to the first glowing rune. 
‚Ä¢ spell[1:4] is tearing a section of the scroll that says "ire" ‚Äî maybe useful for ‚Äúinspire‚Äù or ‚Äútire‚Äù spells.

Strings come with methods ‚Äî magical tools built into Python. 
 
.upper() ‚Üí Makes text ALL CAPS (shouting spell). 
.lower() ‚Üí Makes text all lowercase (whisper spell). 
.replace("a","b") ‚Üí Swaps words (turn slime into toast). 
.find("word") ‚Üí Finds where a secret rune begins. 

curse = "slime monster" 
print(curse.upper())                  # SLIME MONSTER 
print(curse.replace("slime","toast")) # toast monster 

Think of these like incantations you chant to twist the words on your scroll.

lessons.title: Challenge Quest - The Magic Door of Destiny

content.text:
‚ú® Story: 
You stand before a towering magic door in the Library of Whispering Scrolls. 
Glowing runes swirl across its surface: 
 
sword of light 
 
The door hums: 
"To pass, prove your mastery of word sorcery. Fail‚Ä¶ and be turned into a library bookmark forever." üìöüò± 

Tasks (Step by Step) 
 
Awaken the Door (Shouting Spell) 
‚Ä¢ Print the inscription in ALL CAPS with .upper(). The runes will glow when you shout them. 
 
Rewrite Destiny (Replacement Spell) 
‚Ä¢ Replace "light" with "destiny". Print the new inscription: "sword of destiny". 
 
Reveal the Weapon (Rune Slicing) 
‚Ä¢ Slice out the word "sword". This reveals the weapon hidden in the door. 
 
Secret Whisper (Lowering Spell) 
‚Ä¢ Print the inscription in lowercase with .lower(). The door chuckles when you whisper the runes. 
 
Find the Rune (Detect Spell) 
‚Ä¢ Use .find("light") to locate where "light" begins in the string. This tells you where the magic word is carved on the door.

content.expected_output:

sword of destiny

sword of light 
9
content.solution:
inscription = "sword of light" 
 
# 1. Shouting Spell 
print(inscription.upper())   # SWORD OF LIGHT 
 
# 2. Replacement Spell 
print(inscription.replace("light","destiny"))  # sword of destiny 
 
# 3. Rune Slicing 
print(inscription[0:5])      # sword 
 
# 4. Whisper Spell 
print(inscription.lower())   # sword of light 
 
# 5. Detect Spell 
print(inscription.find("light"))   # position of 'light'
